snippet: RICHTER--Patricia Ewing, a lifelong resident of Manhattan, Sorrento, ME, and Garrison, NY, passed away March 1, 2016. Patty was born in NYC on March 17, 1926 to William F.C. Ewing and Emily Fordyce Dodge. Patty was pre-deceased by her husband, Dr. Peter Richter, and is survived by her three sons, four grandchildren, and two sisters. Memorial services are planned for May 21, 2016 in Garrison, NY and in Sorrento, ME on July 23, 2016. 1/3
lead_paragraph: RICHTER--Patricia Ewing, a lifelong resident of Manhattan, Sorrento, ME, and Garrison, NY, passed away March 1, 2016. Patty was born in NYC on March 17, 1926 to William F.C. Ewing and Emily Fordyce Dodge. Patty was pre-deceased by her husband, Dr. Peter Richter, and is survived by her three sons, four grandchildren, and two sisters. Memorial services are planned for May 21, 2016 in Garrison, NY and in Sorrento, ME on July 23, 2016. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RICHTER, PATRICIA EWING
